snippet: Two cosmetic giants unite in a deal valued at $870 million, including debt, in which Revlon is paying $14 for each Elizabeth Arden share.
abstract: Revlon says it will buy Elizabeth Arden for $419.3 million.
lead_paragraph: Two cosmetic giants unite in a deal valued at $870 million, including debt, in which Revlon is paying $14 for each Elizabeth Arden share.

headline.main: Revlon Is Buying Elizabeth Arden for $419.3 Million
headline.print_headline: Revlon Says It Will Buy Elizabeth Arden for $419.3 Million
